DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the corneal epithelium after soft contact lens wear and use of two marketed multi-purpose solutions.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of OPTI-FREE RepleniSH and ReNu Multi-Plus Lens Care Regimens on Corneal Epithelium
DOC.criteria: Successful contact lens wear on a daily wear basis Wear contact lenses at least 8 hours/day Vision correctable to at least 20/30 Normal Eyes Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply Exclusion: Topical ocular medication use Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply
